rooms.description: A spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade to allow abundant natural light and promote a Mediterranean feel. The layout is designed keeping Vastu principles in mind with an east-facing orientation for prosperity.
Adjacent to the living room, this dining space offers a comfortable area for meals. The interior design includes Mediterranean elements and maintains natural lighting.
A modern kitchen designed with a Mediterranean aesthetic. It features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation.
A comfortable master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. The room design incorporates Mediterranean styles and ensures privacy while following Vastu guidelines.
A compact guest bedroom designed to complement the master suite. The room features a window for natural light.
A well-equipped bathroom adjoining the master bedroom. The design adheres to local norms and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A sliding door connecting the living and dining areas to maintain an open floor plan, with design considerations for ease of movement.
Provides direct access between the kitchen and dining room, facilitating service during meals.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that let in natural light and offer panoramic views.
Window designed to provide privacy while ensuring natural light, aligned with Vastu principles.
